markdownRemark.excerpt: You can have the title Senior Engineer but does that truly mean you are acting as a senior? In my opinion, the short answer is no. Being a senior is more aboutâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: You can have the title Senior Engineer but does that truly mean you are acting as a senior? In my opinion, the short answer is no. Being a senior is more about the mindset you have. Do you help others on the team? Are you someone others seek out to get your opinion? Do you look at solutions to problems with a broader lens rather than focusing simply on the problem at hand? To me, these are the things that a senior engineer does.

frontmatter.title: Senior Engineer - Title Or State Of Mind?
frontmatter.description: What does it mean to be a senior engineer?
